Rêve Collection R70142 Toyota Corolla 1600GT 1972 Japan GP 2nd Place K. Takeshita

Purchased: 2014
Manufacturer page: http://www.kokusaiboeki.co.jp/item_detail.php?id=9491

(from The Toyota Celica and Supra in Touring Car Racing)
After the Celica's first significant victory in late 1971, Toyota began to see the Celica's potential for the track. In 1972 Toyota marketed a stripped down version of the car, featuring less luxury items, exclusively in Japan - the Celica GTV. Meanwhile, in the Japan GP held at Fuji in May, Nobuhide Tachi and Kenichi Takeshita took first & second places in their Celica 1600GTs.

Here is a video of some of the action: http://japanesenostalgiccar.com/2011/11/18/friday-video-1972-japan-grand-prix-touring-car-race/. I really like the obstacles on the track (4:32)
